text:
This Guideline was created by students of the HTW Berlin (University of Applied Sciences Berlin) in cooperation with Wikimedia Deutschland e.V..
The project is based on the original concept from Martin Boy, Anja Kammer, Timo Neumann, Laura Seidler.
Thank you!

headline: License notice
text: Christina Beltran Ramos, Veronika Babic, Lina Kriebel, Vivian Zaddach, Simon Binder, Mario Schütz, Lawyer Dude - An e-learning unit on using images from the internet without going to jail, CC BY-SA 4.0

headline: Disclaimer
text:
No legal advice!

This tool is designed to facilitate the compliant re-use of certain copyright-protected images. However, it can never cover all use cases and characteristics, and thus cannot replace qualified legal advice by a lawyer.
